00001 import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms
00002 
00003 process = cms.Process("ErrDump")
00004 
00005 process.maxEvents = cms.untracked.PSet( input = cms.untracked.int32(-1) )
00006 
00007 process.source = cms.Source("ErrorStreamSource",
00008                             fileNames = cms.untracked.vstring('file:../db/closed/kab.812221605.0001.Error.storageManager.00.0000.dat')
00009                             #fileNames = cms.untracked.vstring('file:/tmp/test1.err')
00010                             )
00011 
00012 process.contentAna = cms.EDAnalyzer("EventContentAnalyzer")
00013 
00014 process.p = cms.Path(process.contentAna)
